MobSecurityCertPinEvent.name: MobSecurityCertPinEvent
MobSecurityCertPinEvent.description: The event of mobile security certificate pinning on the Salesforce mobile app with Enhanced Mobile Security.

AppPackageIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for the certificate.

DeviceIdentifier.description: The hardware IDs or IDs to uniquely identify a mobile device.

DeviceModel.description: The model of the mobile device.

EventDate.description: The date of the certificate pinning event.

EventDescription.description: The description of the certificate pinning event.

EventIdentifier.description: The ID of the certificate pinning event.

EventUuid.description: The universally unique identifier of the event.

OsName.description: The name of the operating system.

OsVersion.description: The version of the operating system.

ReplayId.description: The position of the event in the event stream.

WebkitVersion.description: The version of the web browser engine developed by Apple.
